```{r}
library(bio3d)
data <- read.fasta("/Users/Mason/Desktop/BIMM143/BIMM-142/Find a gene project/Heatmap of aligned sequences")
pdbs <- seqidentity(data)
```

```{r}
pc <- pca(pdbs)
plot(pc)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
rd <- rmsd(pdbs, fit=T)
rd
```
```{r}
range(rd)
pdbs
```
```{r}
library(pheatmap)

#colnames(rd) <- paste0("m", 1:5)

```
